mapper.insert: insert into test.t_student(password, age, gender, address, phone) VALUES (#{password}, #{age}, #{gender}, #{address}, #{phone})
mapper.update: update test.t_student set password=#{password}, age = #{age}, gender = #{gender}, address = #{address}, phone = #{phone} where StuId = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from test.t_course where t_course.maxNum > t_course.applyNum

select * from test.t_course, test.t_course_student, test.t_student where test.t_course_student.stuId = #{stuId} and test.t_course_student.courseNo = t_course.courseNo and test.t_course_student.stuId = test.t_student.stuId
select * from test.t_course where courseNo not in (select courseNo from test.t_course_student where stuId = #{stuId}) and t_course.maxNum > t_course.applyNum and t_course.endTime > now()

select * from test.t_course where test.t_course.teacherId in (select t_course.teacherId from test.t_course, test.t_teacher where t_course.teacherId = t_teacher.teacherId and teacherName like #{teacherName})
